description: Controls for anime playback using color-based sequences and bookmarklets for next/previous episode navigation.

actions.description: Move mouse to center of screen

actions.code: javascript:(function(){const next=document.querySelector('.prev-fln .prev-next[style*="right"] a[rel="next"]')||document.querySelector('a[rel="next"]')||document.querySelectorAll('.prev-next a[href*="episode"]')[1];if(next){next.scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth',block:'center'});setTimeout(()=>next.click(),400);}else{alert('%E2%9A%A0%EF%B8%8F No next episode link found!');}})();

actions.description: Move mouse to center of screen

actions.code: javascript:(function(){const prev=document.querySelector('.prev-fln .prev-next[style*="left"] a[rel="prev"]')||document.querySelector('a[rel="prev"]')||document.querySelectorAll('.prev-next a[href*="episode"]')[0];if(prev){prev.scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth',block:'center'});setTimeout(()=>prev.click(),400);}else{alert('%E2%9A%A0%EF%B8%8F No previous episode link found!');}})();
